mapper.update: UPDATE pet_service SET service_name = #{serviceName}, service_desc = #{serviceDesc}, service_price = #{servicePrice}, service_option1 = #{serviceOption1}, service_option2 = #{serviceOption2}, update_datetime = NOW() WHERE service_no = #{serviceNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pet_service (service_no, service_name, service_desc, service_price, create_datetime, update_datetime) VALUES (#{serviceNo}, #{serviceName}, #{serviceDesc}, #{servicePrice}, NOW(), NOW());
mapper.select: SELECT service_no serviceNo, service_name serviceName, service_desc serviceDesc FROM pet_service LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
